pullRequest.title: Add tests for checking pooled MySQL connections closed by server due …
pullRequest.bodyText:
…to wait_timeout
Signed-off-by: Billy Yuan billy112487983@gmail.com
Motivation:
Explain here the context, and why you're making that change, what is the problem you're trying to solve.
Conformance:
Your commits should be signed and you should have signed the Eclipse Contributor Agreement as explained in https://github.com/eclipse/vert.x/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
Please also make sure you adhere to the code style guidelines: https://github.com/vert-x3/wiki/wiki/Vert.x-code-style-guidelines

commit.message:
Add tests for checking pooled MySQL connections closed by server due to wait_timeout

Signed-off-by: Billy Yuan <billy112487983@gmail.com>

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@
 === Getting a connection
 
 When you need to execute sequential queries (without a transaction), you can create a new connection
-or borrow one from the pool:
+or borrow one from the pool, remember once you acquired the connection from the pool until you return it back to the pool, you should take care of the connection because it might be closed by the server for some reasons such as an idle time out.

nodes.bodyText:
Should be a new sentence, not a comma.
"Remember that between acquiring the connection from the pool and returning it to the pool, you should...."
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3,7 +3,7 @@
 === Getting a connection
 
 When you need to execute sequential queries (without a transaction), you can create a new connection
-or borrow one from the pool:
+or borrow one from the pool, remember once you acquired the connection from the pool until you return it back to the pool, you should take care of the connection because it might be closed by the server for some reasons such as an idle time out.
